messages.content: IF YOU'VE GOT AN OPINION ABOUT YOUR FUTURE THEN WHY WOULDN'T YOU VOTE?

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Right to see a cancer specialist
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promises to uphold the right to see a cancer specialist within two weeks and opposes funding cuts that could jeopardize this.
Labour commits to a jobs guarantee.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's so close between Labour and the Tories where you live, that every single vote really will count.

issues.health: The leaflet mentions the commitment to patients having the right to see a cancer specialist within two weeks.

contactInformation.address: Unit 2, Arcot Court, Nelson Road, Cramlington, Northumberland, NE23 1BB
